name: Watch Out, Big Knife!!
description:
Entry into the Seattle Indies Game Jam 2019. Theme: "Intentionally Broken"

Play 5-finger-filet to get out of a school test. Gratuitous blood in this game.

Credits:

  • Melody Bolton
  • Kristin Van Deusen
  • Patrick Godwin
  • Dan Gonyea
  • Travis St. Onge
